synopsis.text:
Valt Aoi's legendary battle against Rantaro Kiyama with their Lightning Beys sparks inspiration in the hearts of Hikaru and Hyuga Asahi, brothers and new members of the Comets Beyblading Club. Determined to challenge Valt, the brothers build their own Lightning Beys using the club's equipment, marking the beginning of their incredible journey in the world of Beyblade Burst.

One year after the events of Beyblade Burst GT, the brothers witness the extraordinary power of Superking/Sparking evolutions of Valkyrie, Ragnaruk, and Satan, pushing them to create their own sparking beys, Hyperion and Helios. As they embark on a global quest to challenge the best bladers and become stronger, they aim to leave their mark in the stadium and surpass the legendary bladers of the Beyblade Burst series.

With a relentless drive to become the best, Hikaru and Hyuga train tirelessly and compete against top-ranked bladers, making their presence known in the all-star battle featuring the greatest bladers from the Beyblade Burst series. Join these ambitious brothers as they let it rip in the stadium and strive to etch their names in Beyblade history.
